basics.name: Juvy Ann Lucero
basics.label: UH Manoa Student
basics.summary: A reliable and trustworthy worker who is motivated to ensure a 110% professional service. Committedto assisting individuals and strongly focus on customer satisfaction. Willing to adapt to changingpriorities and challenge myself in a position to ensure growth in the company with knowledge gainedfrom working in various professional & retail environments.

highlights: Processed cash, credit, and return payments
Build a strong relationship with customers to understand what they are looking for
Consistently focusing on giving a friendly greeting at the fitting room and at the register
Ability to work in fast pace environment

volunteer.organization: Student Room Facilitator for Undergraduate Students
volunteer.summary: Help facilitate each booth by making sure that both the student presenters and the attendees feel comfortable with the technology, helping to connect everyone to the proper resource, and creating a comfortable environment to make this event accessible for all of our students.
A student organization under the Ilokano language & Literature Program at University of Hawai'i at Manoa
highlights: Maintained and organized digital records of the organization's events, activities, and community service initiatives.
Managed and updated social media platforms to ensure accurate and timely information for the Timpuyog Organization, enhancing online engagement.
Educating people about the Filipino culture
Participate in community service and social activities
